com.cloudera.labs.envelope.output

Interface BulkOutput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Output
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemOutput, HBaseOutput, HiveOutput, JdbcOutput, KafkaOutput, KuduOutput, LogOutput

    public interface BulkOutput
extends Output
    Bulk outputs write data out in bulk mutations of a DataFrame at a time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyBulkMutations(List<scala.Tuple2<MutationType,Dataset<Row>>> planned)
      Apply the bulk mutations to the external sink of the output.
      Set<MutationType> getSupportedBulkMutationTypes()
      Get the set of mutation types that this output supports.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.labs.envelope.output.Output

        configure

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedBulkMutationTypes

        Set<MutationType> getSupportedBulkMutationTypes()
        Get the set of mutation types that this output supports.

      • applyBulkMutations

        void applyBulkMutations(List<scala.Tuple2<MutationType,Dataset<Row>>> planned)
        Apply the bulk mutations to the external sink of the output.
        Parameters:
        planned - The list of bulk mutations, where each mutation is composed of a tuple of a mutation type and the mutation data as a DataFrame. The output must apply the mutations in the same order as the list.
